pages.text: The ritual of $(marked)Cleansing$() calls on the Light to cleanse its target of $(l:bewitchment:curses/curse_intro)curses$(). The target is specified with a $(l:bewitchment:tools/taglock)$(item)Taglock$().$(br)The ritual is also applicable to $(marked)Zombie Vilagers$(). Doing so will turn them into normal Villagers.
Note that this ritual is not guaranteed to succeed. Some curses may be harder to get rid off, but -just like with washing- rubbing hard enough will get anything off.
